      • write

        public static void write​(File file,
                         CharSequence content,
                         String encoding)
                  throws IOException
        Writes a content to a file.
        Parameters:
        file - the file (cannot be null).
        content - the content (cannot be null).
        encoding - the encoding to use (cannot be null).
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the file, content or encoding is null.
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs.
        Since:
        2.0.0
